message:
GoA的Google Code页面

v2ex相关版面已撤下，github上ss所有repo的issue都关了，clowwindy的推文全部设置保护，背景换成一杯茶，知乎上的动态刚关注了网安法草案的一个提问

22日上午，由clowwindy管理的SS相关Repo中，python和ios以及shadowvpn已被清空，仅保留写有“Removed according to regulations.”的README.md，commit数只有1。

F*ck regulations
Two days ago the police came to me and wanted me to stop working on this. Today they asked me to delete all the code from GitHub. I have no choice but to obey.

I hope one day I'll live in a country where I have freedom to write any code I like without fearing.

I believe you guys will make great stuff with Network Extensions.

Cheers!
title: SS作者被约谈，项目已Removed according to regulations
